text:
~Hey<@U7SL518D6>, is this feature still in beta and if so, is there a way to register?~

~The GitHub repo seems to link to a Google Doc, which then says to sign-up via the _private beta interest form_ but, the _Custom NPM Packages and Local Testing for Serverless Functions (CMS Ent. Only) box_ doesn't appear to be there anymore~ :slightly_frowning_face:

~Let me know if I'm just looking in all of the wrong places~ :sweat_smile:

*EDIT:* This was resolved by HubSpot and our portal had the beta feature enabled :slightly_smiling_face:
